title: 9 Profitable Amazon KDP Keywords for the Factbook Niche | Low Competition + High Demand Ideas
description:
Struggling to find profitable Amazon KDP keywords for your next high-content book? In this video, we explore 9 powerful KDP keywords in the Factbook niche — all with low competition and high sales potential!

I break down each keyword with: 
✔️ Search Volume & BSR
✔️ Profitability Scores
✔️ Keyword Slot Strategy
✔️ Target Audiences (Kids, Adults)
✔️ Factbook + Workbook series potential

Whether you're publishing educational books, children's nonfiction, or niche-specific trivia, this guide gives you the exact blueprint to tap into high-potential markets.

✨ Bonus: Discover 4 FREE Chrome extensions I use for KDP research.
